title: Statement of Assignments
content:
Introduction of the course materialsThe assignments was created by me during my study in the University of Rochester and they are uploaded to the Course List -> Master. No course-related materials of any professor was uploaded. And the Only use of the related materials is for my individual recording. These materials are not permitted be be used for any other purpose.
About Academic IntegrityIf there are similar assignments or labs or projects in the future, it is the responsibility of UR students not to copy or modify these codes, or other files because it is against the Simon’s Code of Academic Integrity. The owner of this repository doesn’t take any commitment for other’s faults.

title: My first blog: Hexo + Github Pages
content:
This is my first blog!1. Intro to HexoThe official website is https://hexo.io/zh-cn/. It is a swift, clear and efficient frame of blog.
More themes can be found at https://hexo.io/themes/.
2. Environment SetupInstall Homebrew/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

Install Node.jsbrew install node

Install Gitbrew install git
Install Hexonpm install -g hexo-cli

3. Setup a blog with Hexo
New a folder named “blog”
Initialize a blog with Hexo
Enter “blog” folder cd blog
Initialize: hexo init
Launch hexo: hexo s
A new blog is created: http://localhost:4000
New a blog article: hexo n article name
hexo clean & hexo g & hexo s



4. Deploy to Github
New repository: ‘username.github.io’
In folder blog, install the git deploy plugin:npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
In folder blog, in setup of _config.yml(username is the repo name)Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git
  branch: master 
Deploy to far-endhexo d
Attention: Password is required when deploying. In the recent version of github, token of github account was required rather than the password.

5. Selection and Setup of the Theme
Select the theme in https://hexo.io/themes/
Install the theme with the tutorial of the theme
In _config.yml, modify the theme to# Extensions
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: theme_name
hexo clean && hexo g && hexo s
hexo d

This article refered to https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/114195340.

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
